From: [Jeffrey Palm][2]

items.body:
Not a joke, but a cartoon:

From: Jeffrey Palm

items.body_markdown: A SQL query goes into a bar, walks up to two tables and asks, "Can I join you?"
items.body: A SQL query goes into a bar, walks up to two tables and asks, "Can I join you?"

items.body_markdown: I'd like to make the world a better place, but they won't give me the source code.
items.body: I'd like to make the world a better place, but they won't give me the source code.

items.body_markdown:
Two bytes meet.  The first byte asks, “Are you ill?” 

The second byte replies, “No, just feeling a bit off.”
items.body:
Two bytes meet. The first byte asks, “Are you ill?”

The second byte replies, “No, just feeling a bit off.”
